articles.author: Ewan Murray
articles.title: Fowler and Schauffele hit 62s at US Open to etch names into golfing folklore - The Guardian
articles.description: The American duo post 62s to set record pace at US Open and join Branden Grace as only golfers in history to achieve the feat
articles.content:
Jack Nicklaus never managed it. Neither did Tiger Woods. Arnold Palmer, Ben Hogan, Sam Snead, Seve Ballesteros the list goes on.
Luminaries of this sport have come and gone without ever posting 62 a… [+9860 chars]

articles.author: Tyrell Feaster, Reuters
articles.title: PGA Tour and LIV Golf alliance 'will be investigated by the US Justice Department' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Justice Department had previously opened a probe into the PGA Tour's strategies for trying to keep its players from defecting to LIV, which was writing supersized paychecks.
articles.content:
The US Justice Department will review the PGA Tour's plan to merge with Saudi-backed LIV Golf Tour to determine if the move violates antitrust law, according to The Wall Street Journal.
The PGA Tour… [+11070 chars]

articles.title: New wall to deter corner-cutting at Canadian GP venue Montreal - The Race
articles.description: Cutting the Turn 1/2 complex at Formula 1's Canadian Grand Prix venue Montreal will be a lot harder in 2023 - there's now a wall in the way
articles.content:
Track changes at the 2023 Canadian Grand Prix include the extension of a concrete barrier in the Turn 1 run-off area, blocking drivers from cutting Turn 2 so easily.
Previously, the run-off area bet… [+1772 chars]
